scripts.generate: lerna run definitions --scope=@rc-ex/code-generator && lerna run paths --scope=@rc-ex/code-generator && gts fix && lerna run samples --scope=@rc-ex/code-generator
scripts.upgrade-all: yarn-upgrade-all && lerna exec yarn-upgrade-all && yarn reset
scripts.reset: lerna exec 'rm -rf lib' && lerna clean -y && lerna bootstrap
